name: IL Attorney General
tweet: While buy-now-pay-later loans may appear to make payments more manageable, they may also result in debt accumulation.  I led a coalition urging the @CFPB to ensure that buy-now-pay-later lenders are not engaging in practices that trap consumers in a cycle of debt.

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: Ray Tate has pleaded guilty to murder in the shooting of Wayne County sheriff’s deputy Sean Riley.  While nothing will ever make up for the loss to Deputy Sean Riley’s family and loved ones, I hope this guilty plea brings them some degree of justice and aids in their healing.

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: I’m filing a lawsuit against Marathon over the oil spill in Edwardsville.  This oil spill has created a public health risk to the entire community. The long-lasting impact of this could be detrimental if not properly and quickly remediated.    https://t.co/qWQDUSedve

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: "The Attorney General’s office has lost a member of our family, and as an office, we are heartbroken.    I extend my deepest condolences to Elise’s family and friends. May Elise’s memory inspire all of us to live authentically and have humanity toward all." 3/3

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: "Elise was a valued member of our Civil Rights Bureau who, as a tireless advocate for the LGBTQ community, was passionate about her work. Her kindness and infectious smile will be missed by those who worked with her." 2/3

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: “Today is a devastating day for the Office of the Attorney General. After hoping for several days that our friend and colleague Elise Malary would be safely reunited with her family, friends and loved ones, we have received confirmation of the unthinkable." 1/3

name: IL Attorney General

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: Recalled items should not appear on store shelves; however, they may still be available through secondhand sellers.  @kidsindanger's annual report on 2021 recalled children’s products will help consumers avoid buying recalled products for the kids in their lives. Link below ⬇️

name: IL Attorney General
tweet: #EqualPayDay symbolizes the extra days women have to work to catch up to what men were paid in the previous year. The gap is even greater for women of color.   We must dismantle all of the barriers women face in the workplace and beyond to ensure a more equitable future for all.
